\hypersetup{
unicode=false,          % non-Latin characters in Acrobat’s bookmarks
pdftoolbar=false,        % show Acrobat’s toolbar?
pdfmenubar=false,        % show Acrobat’s menu?
pdffitwindow=false,     % window fit to page when opened
pdfstartview={FitH},    % fits the width of the page to the window
pdftitle={Carl Boettiger - Vita},    % title
pdfauthor={Carl Boettiger},     % author
colorlinks=true,       % false: boxed links; true: colored links
linkcolor=red,          % color of internal links
citecolor=blue,        % color of links to bibliography
filecolor=blue,      % color of file links
urlcolor=blue           % color of external links
}

\newsectionwidth{7em}
\renewcommand{\sectionfont}[1]{\bf#1}
% want the document to start higher?
%\voffset = -.5in
% also modify text height...defaults to 9 in  %larger number means more text per page!
\textheight 9.2in

\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancyplain}
\fancyhf{}
\rhead{ \fancyplain{}{\thepage} }
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\cfoot{\fancyplain{}{\thepage} }
\rfoot{\fancyplain{}{Boettiger}}
